name: Genuine Innovations Side of Bacon
description: A Side of Bacon and tubeless tires go hand-in-hand. Tubeless tires will seal themselves pretty much all the time, but when the puncture is too big, put in a plug to seal the deal.Vulcanized butyl rubber rope plugs are light at 1.5g each.Package of 20 plugs.Insertion tool required and sold separately.Eggs and toast not included.
